metadata.title: CVE-2020-11647 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In Wireshark 3.2.0 to 3.2.2, 3.0.0 to 3.0.9, and 2.6.0 to 2.6.15, theBACapp dissector could crash. This was addressed inepan/dissectors/packet-bacapp.c by limiting the amount of recursion.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11647` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 3.2.3-1
libwireshark13 - 3.2.3-1
libwiretap10 - 3.2.3-1
libwsutil11 - 3.2.3-1
tshark - 3.2.3-1
wireshark - 3.2.3-1
wireshark-common - 3.2.3-1
wireshark-gtk - 3.2.3-1
wireshark-qt - 3.2.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.3-1').
